name: Pyramid Of Mirror
description:
You are an explorer and you must go to the Pyramid of Mirrors.

Your goal : Reach the treasure room, you have to go through 6 floors with monsters, in less than 6 min.

Keyboard :

     Move: Arrow    

     X: Without Weapon

     C: Weapon against ghost

     V: Weapon against mummie

     Space : Attack with weapon for mummie

This is my submission for the GameJam : Duality Jam (Mirror World)

I code all the game alone using C# with FNA. I take the asset given by the GameJa and modify/recolor it. For the sound, I take the free use sound given in GameCodeur, and for music I use one of the music given by the GameJam.
